attributes.action: Lift the benefit cap for families through covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
Families all over the uk are being affected by the benefit cap because of not being able to work due the the coronavirus!
Some parents are having to use their grace period to not be affected by the cap but once this is used we can not be exempt again.
So what happens if some parents simply don’t have any work to return too they would have used their grace period through these troubling times.
When so many other people are getting or being offered help because of covid-19 but not the larger families.
attributes.background:
Lift the benefit cap for families that are out of work because of the coronavirus!.
So that parents are not made to use their grace period.
